read data
```{r, cache=TRUE}
library(data.table)
activities_raw <- fread('../data/raw/act_train.csv')
people_raw <- fread('../data/raw/people.csv')
```

```{r, cache=TRUE}
summary(activities_raw)
summary(people_raw)
```
